title: How to write a good anchoring script for the graduation ceremony of kindergarten - Quora

response.answer_text: as its graduation ceremony of tiny tots, instead of keeping it formal try to make it interesting. Identify unique personality traits of kids by interacting with their class teacher .Keep it concise and more on fun side. P.s involve kids…. u can ask them to cheer up their friends, ask them some random questions about their parents….overall make it fun for them. Hope it is helpful to you.
